diff_act: 5.restrict access to authorized users by modifying user access rights

regen.absent_element: logging each instance of user access
regen.new_specification: The DUAP System shall log each instance of user access to ensure traceability and security.

regen.absent_element: explicit logging of user access activities
regen.new_specification: The DUAP System shall log user access activities to ensure monitoring and audit trail accuracy.
The DUAP System shall log user access events, capturing details of successful and attempted accesses.

label: The DUAP System shall be able to log records of user access.
